headline.main: Deal Is Reached to Return the Opposition Leader Riek Machar to South Sudan

snippet: The government of Salva Kiir said it was prepared to take a step toward ending a civil war that has left tens of thousands of people dead and two million displaced.
lead_paragraph: The government of Salva Kiir said it was prepared to take a step toward ending a civil war that has left tens of thousands of people dead and two million displaced.
